pkgmetadata.longdescription: Goodness-of-Fit Testing for Structural Equation Models // Supports eigenvalue block-averaging p-values (Foldnes, Grnneberg, 2018) doi:10.1080/10705511.2017.1373021, penalized eigenvalue block-averaging p-values (Foldnes, Moss, Grnneberg, WIP), penalized regression p-values (Foldnes, Moss, Grnneberg, WIP), as well as traditional p-values such as Satorra-Bentler. All p-values can be calculated using unbiased or biased gamma estimates (Du, Bentler, 2022) doi:10.1080/10705511.2022.2063870 and two choices of chi square statistics.
